title: [Minecraft.net | INSIDER] 十件你或许不知道的那些事：关于敌对生物！
author: :spgbigfan:
txt_content:
10 Things You Probably Didn't Know about Hostile Mobs!
十件你或许不知道的那些事：关于敌对生物！
Our most hostile YouTube video yet? Quite possibly!
这是我们最有敌对性的视频吗？很可能是的！
Which hostile mob originally looked more like a Villager? How can you use a mob to spread your name through the Overworld? What onEarth is Steve doing at the end of this video? We attempt to answer all of these big questions in Episode 4 of our almost-but-not-quite-educational series 10 Things You Probably Didn't Know about Minecraft: Hostile Mobs!
哪种敌对生物最初看起来最像村民？怎样借助一种生物来让你的名字传遍主世界？Steve在视频的最后究竟在干什么？关于这些大问题，将在我们“差不多有点教育意义”的视频栏目中全数解答，欢迎收看第四集，十件你或许不知道的那些事：关于敌对生物！

https://www.bilibili.com/video/av61960333
视频由@WuGuangYao2012 提供

Want more fabulous facts?Click here to see Episode One, which is all about the Village and Pillage update. Or if you want to look back on ** of Minecraft, click here for Episode Two . Or maybe you'd like to learn 10 Things You Probably Didn't Know about the Update Aquatic?
还有其它更精彩的小知识吗？点击这里观看第一集，都是关于村庄与掠夺更新的。 或者如果你想回顾Minecraft的这十年，就点击这里观看第二集。又或者你想了解一下关于水域更新，十件你或许不知道的那些事？

For more great Minecraft videos,subscribe to our YouTube channel.
想收看更多有趣的Minecraft视频，就来订阅我们的YouTube 频道吧！

【原文：10 Things You Probably Didn't Know about Hostile Mobs!】
【作者：Tom Stone，发布日期：2019-08-10，译者：Kakagou】

replies.txt_content: 这个声音听起来好难受……

replies.txt_content: 这个声音莫名的磁性啊
